description: Approval of details required by Condition 3 (Facing materials - Partial discharge re. Sample 11 Bin  Bike Sheds) of Planning Permission 15/16840/FUL (demolition of existing buildings and erection of two and three storeys buildings to create 49 residential units, ground floor units for Use Classes A1/A2/A3 pr A4, with associated car and cycle parking and landscaping)
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that the condition, as noted above, is partially discharged .

The assessment of this application has been based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings. If you carry out development based on incorrect plans then the development may be liable to enforcement action.

Please provide a copy of block plan scaled 1:500 with a scale bar showing the proposed works (hatched or shaded) in relation to the existing dwelling, site boundaries and any outbuildings on site.  The block plan should also show adjoining properties to the side and rear and those opposite in full outline.This application include the new driveway with drop kerb, which is shown in proposed block plan therefore please revise the block plan to show the size of proposed drop kerb.
